column2:
"Failed the Trial
Extensive damage was dealt to the target(s)!"
"Cannot execute as another player has started matching."
"You are already participating in another Field Race."
"Field Race registration has begun at a nearby Terminal"
"Press and hold to return to the Racing Console."

"Would you like to withdraw from this Field Race?

When you withdraw from the race, only you will be returned to the Racing Console."
"Would you like to return to the $(0) Racing Console?"
"Target enemy defeated: Time limit increased by <yellow>$(0) seconds<c>."
"Increased rewards based on total damage dealt"
